head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BROOKS, HARRY A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BROOKS, HARRY A.

block.p: BROOKS-Harry A. Of Glen Head, LI, on June 2, 2000, age 87. Beloved husband of Helen M. (Holly). Father of Melissa Brooks Zakarian and Miranda Brooks Meyer. Stepfather of James R. Lowell, III and Howard B. Lowell; their spouses and seven grandchildren. Service St. John's of Lattingtown, Locust Valley, NY, Tuesday, June 6 at 11:00 AM. In lieu of flowers the family asks that a donation be made to Nassau County Museum of Art, Roslyn, New York.
